attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LRMi0BtzS0EKiCCJWdL_desc
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the scabbie can move up to its speed towards a hostile target it can see

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LRMi3COtWYz4Lz5MdVW_desc
attribs.current: Any spell the scabbie casts that deals radiant damage deals necrotic damage instead

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LRMi5SfbaGCyyb1jN5Z_desc
attribs.current:
The scabbie is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The scabbie has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): resistance, sacred flame, toll the dead, word of radiance
1st level (4 slots): bane, guiding bolt, inflict wounds, protection from evil and good
2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, spiritual weapon
3rd level (2 slots): bestow curse, dispel magic

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LRMiB-T9d2l4BPB5E8b_desc
attribs.current:
A creature that touches the scabbie or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw.

On a failed save, the target is infected by subdermal parasites and must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns or spend its action that turn scratching the relentless itching of the parasites. A creature that fails its saving throw by 5 or more also takes 5 (2d4) slashing damage from their own scratching as they gouge out chunks of their own flesh. The parasites are destroyed if the target receives magical healing.

Additionally, any creature can take an action to treat the parasites with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Medicine) check. On a failure, the creature attempting to treat the parasites is also infected.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LRMiWScqa8LdIoZPidr_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it is affected by the orc's subdermal parasites.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LRMiuGMDnYYqtimVjbG_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LRMiwujV4S-QXHeu1B2_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LRMiwujV4S-QXHeu1B2_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 necrotic damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell’s damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LRMjAxDsdBJlF8JcfJ1_atk_desc
attribs.current: A creature you can see must pass a Wisdom save or take necrotic damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage die is 1d12; otherwise, it's 1d8.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LRMiyhaIX7wquTGeMHp_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature you can see must pass a Wisdom save or take necrotic damage. If it's missing any hit points, the damage die is 1d12; otherwise, it's 1d8.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LRMjSnKIZNDpQtBMORL_spelldescription
attribs.current: Each creature of your choice that you can see must pass a Constitution save or take 2d6 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LRMjf5PP1yvQRhQp9hD_atk_desc
attribs.current: Each creature of your choice that you can see must pass a Constitution save or take 2d6 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMjvzdxkuaZ83igSVr_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMjvzdxkuaZ83igSVr_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMjvzdxkuaZ83igSVr_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMk5aV-f56RZwAWQpy_spelltarget
attribs.current: A creature of your choice within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMk5aV-f56RZwAWQpy_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMk5aV-f56RZwAWQpy_spelldescription
attribs.current: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMke7gGRA-7MDaynqg_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMke7gGRA-7MDaynqg_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMkgcb0yK-NkTdPgBX_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Holy water or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LRMkgcb0yK-NkTdPgBX_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. The protection grants several benefits. Creatures of those types have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target. The target also can’t be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them. If the target is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by such a creature, the target has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LRMkiWfgtaXNhPhWoRg_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LRMkiWfgtaXNhPhWoRg_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LRMkiWfgtaXNhPhWoRg_spelldescription
attribs.current: You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LRMkkS9vzZ8RSZVJNcw_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LRMkkS9vzZ8RSZVJNcw_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it. The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell’s effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LRMkmSrLd8mghPg9-Du_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the Duration is Concentration, up to 10 minutes. If you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the durati⁠on is 8 hours. If you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the dura⁠tion is 24 hours. If you use a 9th level spell slot, the spell lasts until it is dispelled. Using a spell slot of 5th level or higher grants a durat⁠ion that doesn’t require concentrati⁠on.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LRMkmSrLd8mghPg9-Du_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of the spell. When you cast this spell, choose the nature of the curse from the following options: Choose one ability score. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability score. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. While cursed, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns. If it fails, it wastes its action that turn doing nothing. While the target is cursed, your attacks and spells deal an extra 1d8 necrotic damage to the target. A remove curse spell ends this effect. At the DM’s option, you may choose an alternative curse effect, but it should be no more powerful than those described above. The DM has final say on such a curse’s effect.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LRMko7ctZc2zxTLjoyh_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature, object, or magical effect within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LRMko7ctZc2zxTLjoyh_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you automatically end the effects of a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LRMko7ctZc2zxTLjoyh_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell’s level. On a successful check, the spell ends.
